channel.title: 2021-05-21 SocialCG Meeting
channel.description:
Per [the wiki](https://www.w3.org/wiki/SocialCG#Meetings) and [the calendar ](https://cloud.w3c.social/apps/calendar/p/GzxsDfE6CKtp9MHX/dayGridMonth/now), this meeting will be at:
* 5pm UTC * 1pm EDT * 10am PDT
2021-05-21T17:00:00Z → 2021-05-21T18:00:00Z
## Location https://bbb.w3c.social/b/rhi-vp1-fv6-vn7
## Fallback Location (if people have connection trouble to bbb above): tba
# Agenda:
* 5min - quick introductions/reintroductions * 5min - @codenamedmitri - update on Metaverse Interoperability CG ([process](https://github.com/omigroup/OMI/blob/a4c3c19fde1fabc2dfb0224b207a54b5f962c82d/PROCESS.md), [CG Chair Nominations](https://github.com/omigroup/OMI/discussions/17) -- SocialCG members wanted!) * 5-10min - @codenamedmitri - update on https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/proposal-rank-choice-meeting-times-for-the-weekend-socialcg-meeting/1713 * 50min - free-form

item.title: 2021-05-21 SocialCG Meeting
item.dc:creator: codenamedmitri
item.description:
Per the wiki and the calendar , this meeting will be at:

  • 5pm UTC
  • 1pm EDT
  • 10am PDT

2021-05-21T17:00:00Z → 2021-05-21T18:00:00Z

Location

bbb.w3c.social

Social Web Incubator CG

You have been invited to join Social Web Incubator CG using BigBlueButton. To join, click the link above and enter your name.

Fallback Location

(if people have connection trouble to bbb above):
tba

Agenda:

  • 5min - quick introductions/reintroductions
  • 5min - @codenamedmitri - update on Metaverse Interoperability CG (process, CG Chair Nominations – SocialCG members wanted!)
  • 5-10min - @codenamedmitri - update on PROPOSAL: Rank choice meeting times for the weekend SocialCG Meeting
  • 50min - free-form
